item images viewing of
images items associated with
items images associated with Item Images
section.para: Images may be associated with items in the Item master. To view images associated with an item, select the Images option. The following screen will appear:
When viewing item images, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter the item number of the item whose associated images you want to view.

note.para: Images are associated with items in a two-step process. First, an image must be loaded into the database at the system level. Second, the link between image and item must be made using the Images tab found on the Item master.

listitem.para: A preview of the first item image will appear here. To view the next image associated with the item, select the forward arrow \>\> button. To view previous images, select the back arrow << button.
